description: Jason fresh from tennessee bumped into Luke the night before at the pool, but Luke has a girl friend and has never tried to be with a guy before but seems to be somewhat interested in Jason. At first he didnt really seem like he was into it but boy did he change his mind! His girl wasnt giving him a blowjob at home and Jason told him he can take care of that for him, and he sure did! He took care of him from every position. Check it out.
title: Thick And Meaty
